website_summaries.verdict: Large capacity rice cooker than can handle 6-cups of uncooked rice at a time.
pros: Cooks brown rice as well as white rice
Can handle 6 cups dry, making 12 cups of cooked rice
A sturdy and durable rice cooker that will last
cons: This rice cooker only has 2 cooking functions, which pales in comparison to the 6 or more functions of other Cuckoo models

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait this long to buy this!?!? Works great and my Thai wife uses this everyday and loves it. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Trevor W

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to use. Can leave rice in there for two days and will not get hard. Worth the price. I used to have aroma brand and is doesn't compare to this easy amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And use it every single day for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! And use it every single day for my rice I bought this one like 2 years ago and still working perfectly make my life easier
customer_reviews.author: Lina Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice Now
customer_reviews.text: I had one before but it never came out right. I researched and read these reviews before purchasing it. Not only is it my favorite color , the rice is perfect too!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEY DORR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase "Made in Japan". Well, Cuckoo is made in Korea. Daughter says she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: beebee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My second same one. Great affordable cooker and made in korea.
customer_reviews.author: younjeong choi

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This cooks rice fast and is simple to use. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Uy

customer_reviews.title: How do I fix the warm light on?
customer_reviews.text: I only use it for 2 months the warm light is dead not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: This one replaces the Cuckoo I bought in 1998, that was still working great except the pan rusted out. I used the old one everyday and it lasted 16 years! Cuckoo has improved the pan and kept the simplicity without all the electronics that can fail easily and be costly to replace. I liked the orange color scheme of my old cooker ( I don't have a Hello Kitty microwave to match the pink ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette A Headland

customer_reviews.title: Why changed model?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Cuckoo CRP-G1015F 10 Cup Electronic Pressure Rice Cooker, 110V, Pink. But I receives CR-0631 6CUP. Why changed model?
customer_reviews.author: Hyungwoo Kim

customer_reviews.title: you can keep it in warm for 2 days and the rice still smells good. I thought this one would be the same ...
customer_reviews.text: If I leave the cooker in "warm" overnight because I still have rice in it, the next morning, the rice smells stale. I used to have a Cuckoo Rice Cooker that my Korean MIL gave me and that one, you can keep it in warm for 2 days and the rice still smells good. I thought this one would be the same but it's not. I have to pull the plug otherwise if I just leave it in "warm", rice would smell after 6 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a basic rice cooker and I LOVE the pink color. I make rice 3 or so times per week. I never would’ve believed that the rice would stay fresh for the next day but it does! It makes up to 6 cups. If you aren’t used to a rice cooker, my friend suggested I rinse my rice in a rice colander and it works great to make my rice less sticky/clumpy. I bought a $6 plastic one on amazon and it’s perfect. Rinse until your water runs clear, then add the rinsed rice and fresh water to the fill line.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a few months, then it started to burn the bottom of the rice. Now it won't even cook and keeps popping up to "warm" when there is still a lot of water. I don't know if I got a faulty unit or what, but it was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: Had to reorder this brand for my Thai mom in ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder this brand for my Thai mom in law. The only problem is the condensation catcher on the side, when you close the lid (if you close it hard) the catcher falls and there is water on the table. We tape ours and then clean it out as needed. Yes, we scotch tape. That is the only drawback. But we use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rice, but don't put in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect rice, but don't put the bowl in the dishwasher because the outside washes off. The inside (which is teflon) is fine, but yeah... weird.
customer_reviews.author: pretty puppy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't have fancy function but cooks rice perfect. The rice stays few days without changing smell or taste.
customer_reviews.author: serious buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great; however, the instructions are non existent in the manual that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product fast and efficient recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good machine fast efficient rice cooker but if you want the best quality of the rice, wait a few min after warm light turned and eat.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't purchase this from Amazon, but I wish I had. It's cheaper on here! LOVE this rice cooker. I had so man different pressure cookers, but could never find one that cooked rice like my grandma's(Korean) rice cooker, so I looked for this brand. Totally worth it and it's the perfect size for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy simple rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: It is a basic rice cooker but it works great. It is way better than Japanese brand. Cooking time is very short and rice cooks perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: My Korean mother approves
customer_reviews.text: My mom got me one of these because she's had one just like it for years and is familar with the brand because she's Korean,. Cooks rice perfectly every time. My husband used to make rice on the stove and it tasted good but he burned some rice to the bottom of the pot every single time. We don't have that issue anymore and it's so much faster
customer_reviews.author: wylona

product_meta.title: Cuckoo CR-0631 Rice Cooker, 3 Liters / 3.2 Quarts, Pink
product_meta.description: CR-0631 is the classic and traditional rice cooker that is reliable to cook your rice. If you just want to cook rice only then this is the perfect model for you.
